title: Ex-CEO of Bankrupt Aquatic-Parks Company Arrested in Cancun
description: The former head of bankrupt aquatic-parks operator The Dolphin Company has been arrested in Mexico, according to law enforcement.
content: The former head of bankrupt aquatic-parks operator The Dolphin Company has been arrested in Mexico, according to law enforcement.
